title: Gamebreaking easy reproduce Protobelt Mordekaiser bug (I know it's morde but hear me out please)
body:
There is a gamebreaking bug on Morde when using Protobelt{{item:3152}}  that is very easy to reproduce. The bug causes his W(circle indicator) to become invisible for the rest of the game once it happens.

All you do is cast his W then use protobelt and reactivate his W during the dash and your W will be invisible for the rest of the game, even if you die or sell protobelt.

This bug is very annoying to play with and happens all the time because I find protobelt fun to build on Morde. 
{{sticker:sg-janna}} 

Please fix it

Video of how to do the bug:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qs15SCcQab8
